Texts.Chs: 第四天 - 我找到了一种固体金属。 它半透明，但在黑暗中也闪闪发亮。 是金属的还是水晶，我不知道。 我很高兴它在这里，因为我可以看到在我周围的黑暗中有一些物品运动。小而发光的眼睛自阴影中凝视...
Texts.Eng: Day 4 - I found a solid metal of a sort. It remains translucent but glowing, even in darkness. Whether it is metal or crystal, I can't tell. I'm glad it's here though, because I can see some movement in the darkness around me. Little glowing eyes are peering from the shadows...
